Boss, maybe you should just take a few days off.
Greta! Didn't it seem weird to you that I kept telling the truth all morning?
What are you saying? That you are incapable of lying?
That's right! I am incapable of lying!
You don't believe me, do you?
Okay. Ask me something you think I would normally lie about.
All right. Remember a couple of months ago when I wanted a raise?
and I asked if you would give it to me out of your own pocket.
because it would create jealousy among the other secretaries.
